thread.title: Trump Replies to Barbs in James Comey’s New Book on Twitter

author: Michael C. Bender
title: Trump Replies to Barbs in James Comey’s New Book on Twitter
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump took aim at former Federal Bureau of Investigation Director James Comey on Friday, calling him a “weak and untruthful slime ball” days ahead of the publication of a new book by Mr. Comey that refers to the president as a “deeply flawed person and leader.”
In a pair of early morning posts on Twitter, the president used a series of derogatory adjectives and nouns to describe Mr. Comey while also accusing him of lying to Congress and leaking classified information, and called for him to be prosecuted.
...
